data.name: labelWelcome.Text
data.value:
Thank you for choosing GeoChatter!
This wizard will help you set up GeoChatter for basic play.
To access all settings at any time simply press F2 to open the menu and select "File"->"Settings". Alternativly you can press Ctrl+Shift+S to open the settings directly!
By clicking "Show advanced settings" in the settings dialog you can access many more settings then through this wizard.

data.name: label27.Text
data.value: The GeoChatter app will automatically receive the required token locally (without it ever leaving your PC!) and test that it works correctly! This token only gives GeoChatter permission to read && write chat && whisper messages.

data.name: labelFlagPacks.Text
data.value:
In addition to currently over 370 default flags that are available for use in Geochatter, we also offer the ability to install custom packs.
You can either manually create or download and install custom flag packs or you can automatically install from our curated list of packs.
To open the official flag pack installer simply click the button below!

data.name: lblFormulas.Text
data.value:
GeoChatter supports custom formulas for the calculation of points.
We have added a feature-rich Score Formulator to create those.
Within this Formulator you can click a formula together, do test guesses and check the calculations.
This way you can verify that the created formula has the desired affect!
Press "F2" -> "Score Formulator" to access it!

data.name: txtGeneralOauthToken.ToolTip
data.value:
Enter your Twitch-OAuth-Token here! NOTE: Make sure to be logged in with your bot account when retrieving the token!
If you don't have or want to use a seperate bot account, stay logged in with your main account.
